docs.snippet: The moves raise the question of what the team plans to do with Geno Smith, who will be entering his second season....
docs.lead_paragraph: The moves raise the question of what the team plans to do with Geno Smith, who will be entering his second season.
docs.abstract: New York Jets release quarterback Mark Sanchez, opening up slot for Michael Vick, who signs one-year, $5 million contract with team; move raises question of what team intends to do with quarterback Geno Smith, who will be entering his second season.

headline.main: Jets Release Mark Sanchez to Make Room for Michael Vick
headline.print_headline: Jets Sign Vick and Cut Sanchez

docs.snippet: Every spring, it seems, a little-known team and a big personality emerge from the chaos of the N.C.A.A. tournament to capture national attention. This year, the first candidates are the Bison and their coach, Saul Phillips....
docs.lead_paragraph: Every spring, it seems, a little-known team and a big personality emerge from the chaos of the N.C.A.A. tournament to capture national attention. This year, the first candidates are the Bison and their coach, Saul Phillips.
docs.abstract: North Dakota State men's basketball team, fresh from upset victory over Oklahoma, is playing confidently under coach Saul Phillips in their first NCAA tournament appearance; Phillips is known for his cheerful demeanor and his insistence that players have fun.

headline.main: North Dakota State Thinks Big, Has Fun, Earns Attention
headline.print_headline: Cheerful Coach Has Results to Celebrate
